---
title: "QC report (example)"
format: html
---

```{r}

library(purrr)
library(here)
library(fs)
purrr::walk(.x = fs::dir_ls(here('R')), .f = source)

qc_dat <- readr::read_rds(
  here('data', 'qc', 'DFCI', 'qc_dat.rds')
)
```

## Introduction

This report will be for high level overview of the quality control checks.

```{r}
qc_dat %>%
  select(qc_layer, dat_name, all_passed)
```
